Powerful Features to Streamline Your Business

andalanKU provides comprehensive tools designed to efficiently manage your data

Inventory Management

Track stock levels, manage product information, and automatically generate purchase orders when inventory runs low.

Learn more

Employee Database

Organize employee profiles, track performance, manage schedules, and streamline your HR processes.

Learn more

Financial System

Keep track of revenue, expenses, generate reports, and gain insights into your business financials with ease.

Learn more

Analytics Dashboard

Visualize your data with powerful charts and graphs to make informed business decisions quickly.

Learn more

Advanced Security

Keep your data secure with role-based access control, encryption, and automatic backups.

Learn more

Mobile Access

Access your data from anywhere, on any device with our responsive web application and mobile apps.
